Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 3 Kusalattika, Cūḷantaraduka » 3.4 Kusalattika, Sappaṭighaduka » 3.4.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccanīya
Hetu
Kusalattika, Cūḷantaraduka
Kusalattika, Sappaṭighaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccanīya
Hetu
23.
1154Kusalo appaṭigho dhammo kusalassa appaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1155Akusalo appaṭigho dhammo akusalassa appaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1156Abyākato appaṭigho dhammo abyākatassa appaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
24.
1157Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa…pe…  avigate terasa. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
